eu.cqse.check.framework.core.ruleset

Interface IRulesetRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EAutosarCpp14Rule, EMisraC2012Rule

    public interface IRulesetRule
    Functions to be provided by rules in a rule set.

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleId

        java.lang.String getRuleId()
        Returns a human readable rule id (e.g. "M2-1-3") that is unique within the ruleset.

      • getRuleText

        java.lang.String getRuleText()
        Returns a readable name of description of the rule.

      • contributeRules

        void contributeRules(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contributor)
        Allows to contribute rule mappings that are not custom checks. See implementations for examples.
        Parameters:
        contributor - accepts the rule id and the name of the general check.
